Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.HarveyVeggiePro: {Text} Anyone who grow and ship 260 vegetables will get a reward from the Town Agricultural and the Town Health Funds.
Providing a diversity of fresh vegetable to the local market can only help improving health.
People are more likely to cook vegetable if they see them around.
Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.GusHotPeppers_T: {Text} Anyone who can grow some and ship them will get a reward.
Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.GusHotPeppers_R: My ingredients are running low and i need fresh hot peppers. Not any variety will do, only the one listed.
One kind of hot sauce isn't enough, and to make more, i'm in need of specific varieties of peppers.
